General.Name: Delta Drone SA
General.Description: Delta Drone SA provides civilian drone services for professional use in France, Belgium, Morocco, South Africa, Ghana, and Australia. It offers ISS SPOTTER Tethered, a security drone for temporary surveillance; ISS SPOTTER Automatic, an autonomous surveillance drone in a box; COUNTBOT, an inventory drone solution that enhance the reliability of stock management; and SPOTTER BOT, a mobile video security solution for construction sites, industrial sites, sporting events, concerts, fairs, traffic management, etc. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Dardilly, France.
